subject: From the Desk of Mr. Jeff Clau
body:
From the Desk of Mr. Jeff Clauss
Director Customs Department
U.S Customs and Border Protection, St. Petersburg, Florida
14700 Teminal Blvd #120, Clearwater, FL 33762, United States
Good day to you and how are you doing today?
My name is Mr. Jeff Clauss from St. Petersburg, Florida. I am
writing to let you know that we received several consignment boxes
signed and approved by the United Nations with some different people's
names/inscription on the boxes and among the consignment boxes that
are still in our custody, your name was included on two of the
consignment boxes. Other of these consignment boxes are from our New
Jersey branch Customs Office while some are from several banks in
Europe and some parts of Asia which have all been sent to our office
here in St. Petersburg for our office to make clarification that you
receive your two consignment boxes in our custody.
However, two days ago (Mrs. Susan Brown) sent us a message stating
that she was a family member of yours. Not only that, she also said
that you are no more alive, and for that, she made us to understand
that you handed over your two consignment boxes in our custody to her
when you were still alive. Therefore, this lady (Mrs. Susan Brown) is
demanding from our office that the two consignment boxes be released
to her since she is standing as your next of kin but we the custom
department St. Petersburg, Florida is still waiting to see if you will
respond to this email, thereby, delaying to accede to her request.
So, this lady (Mrs. Susan Brown) is not your Next of Kin?
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Jeff Clauss
Director Customs Department
St. Petersburg, Florida

subject: Re: From the Desk of Mr. Jeff Clau
body:
Hello Mr. Jeff Clauss,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. I must say, this is quite surprising news to receive. I can assure you that Mrs. Susan Brown is not my next of kin, and I am very much alive.

I'm curious to know more about these boxes that have been sent to your office in St. Petersburg. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly is inside these boxes and why were they sent to your office? Also, how did the United Nations come to be involved in this matter?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying this situation for me.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: From the Desk of Mr. Jeff Clau
body:
ATTN:  Julie
I received your email and I thank you so much for your quick response to
the email that i sent to you, and please thank your God that you are still
alive because Susan brown wanted to lie against you and then sit on your
two consignment boxes, so therefore please I want you to reconfirm to me
your complete full name and the address of where you are living, so that
your two consignment boxes can be deliver to you right there, and make sure
you also give me your cell phone or any phone where you can be reach, so
that I will call you after meeting with my higher authorities today
for the release of your two consignment boxes.

Your urgent response is needed and once I hear from you with the
needed information,  and I will hand it over to our delivering department
so that our delivering agent will start coming to meet with you by tomorrow
and I will not forget to let you know that this  two consignment boxes
is made up of cash and  one of the consignment box contain 5 million
dollars while the other consignment box contain 5.5 million dollars
which is totaling 10.5 million dollars and this two consignment boxes
is from the United Nations office and it was approved in your name and the
mission of this two consignment boxes that is coming to you is for you
to use 40% of the total 10.5 million dollars to set up a charity
organization in the name of the United Nations and in other to be
helping the poor and then %60 will go for you and therefore please
give me your cell phone number because i will call you today after
having a meeting with my higher authorities and you need to let me know the
best time to reach you on the telephone so that i can details you more
on how this delivery of your two consignment boxes can be done to your
house.
without having any problem.
Thanks
Mr. Mark Clifford
Customs Department Director
SAINT Petersburg Florida USA

subject: Re: From the Desk of Mr. Jeff Clau
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Clifford,

Thank you for your email and for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern about Susan Brown and the information you have shared with me. However, before I provide any personal details, I would like to know more about the background of this situation.

Could you please explain to me how Susan Brown is involved and why she wanted to lie against me? Also, what are the two boxes that you mentioned? It would be helpful if you could provide more information about their contents and how they are related to the United Nations.

Additionally, I am curious to know how the delivery process will work. Will there be any fees or charges associated with it? And what security measures are in place to ensure the safe arrival of these boxes?

I look forward to hearing from you soon with more details.

Best wishes,
Julie
